short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: View social meta tags for a website

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly view social meta tags for a page, and preview how your page will look when embedded on social media. A toolbar button is added that shows a popup containing all the meta tags on the current page. The meta tags are grouped by their consumers, with the Facebook and Twitter tabs showing an example of how the current page will display when shared on social media.
